root.name: Snowman's Dilemma
root.description: OverviewSnowman's Dilemma is an XNA Community game where you play as a snowman searching for his lost presents. You have to solve puzzles in the fastest time possible while using the least amount of moves. You have to watch out for fire or you will inevitably die; yes, snowmen can die too! The game is single-player only and has no XBL integration.
